name: REAP&SOW
description:
Your farm is under attack by Orcs. Defend it with your corn powered rifle. Plant and harvest corn for ammo. Do the same with eggplants for eggplant powered health packs. Hold out until you can defeat the king of the Orcs. 

WASD To Move

Left Click To Fire

Right Click On Dirt Mound To Plant Seeds

Right Click On Plants To Harvest

TAB To Switch Seeds

Shift To Consume Eggplants/Heal

Good luck with this delightfully buggy mess.
